summary: This is a letter from an Assistant United States Attorney to the court regarding proposed redactions to the sentencing transcript in United States v. [redacted], case number 13 Cr. 416 (PGG). The government requests the letter and exhibit be filed under seal because they discuss an ongoing criminal investigation.

persons.name: Xavier Donaldson
persons.context: Copied on the email regarding proposed redactions to the sentencing transcript in the Epstein-related case.

events.title: Government Request to Seal Sentencing Transcript Redactions
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office submits a letter and exhibit proposing redactions to a sentencing transcript and requests they be filed under seal due to an ongoing criminal investigation.

locations: One Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, NY 11106
keyFacts: The document relates to case number 13 Cr. 416 (PGG), United States v. [redacted], which is an Epstein-related case.
The government is proposing redactions to a sentencing transcript dated September 12, 2019 (190912).
The government requests the redaction proposals be filed under seal because they discuss an ongoing criminal investigation.
Attorney Xavier Donaldson is copied on the correspondence.
The communication originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
